panama.filter
Class Filter

java.lang.Object
  panama.filter.Filter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpressionFilter, LogicalExpression, PropertyComparator
public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object

Base class and Factory for filters of all kinds.

Ridcully

Method Detail

match

public boolean match(java.lang.Object object)
This method applies the Filter onto the specified object. The method in this base class simply returns true, classes extending this class will return more useful values.

Parameters:
object -
Returns:
wether the specified object matches the filter.

match

public boolean match(java.lang.Object object,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FilterExtension> filterExtensions)
This method applies the Filter onto the specified object. The method in this base class simply returns true, classes extending this class will return more useful values.

Parameters:
object -
filterExtensions - a Map for additional stuff
Returns:
wether the specified object matches the filter.

asExpression

public com.avaje.ebean.Expression asExpression(com.avaje.ebean.Query<?> query,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FilterExtension> filterExtensions)
Creates representation of the Filter for use with Ebean Expression model. The method in this base class simply returns an 'always true' expression, classes extending this class will return more useful values.

Parameters:
filterExtensions - A Map with optional stuff for special filter treatments
Returns:
an Expression representing the Filter.

stdSearchFilter

public static Filter stdSearchFilter(java.lang.String pattern,
                                     java.lang.String... propertyNames)
Creates a standard search filter that is case insensitive and matches ^.*pattern.*$.
